description: This file defines middleware error handling functions for a Node.js application, including a 404 not found handler and a general error handler, and exports them for use in other parts of the application.

methods.name: notFoundHandler
methods.description: Handles 404 Not Found errors by sending a JSON response with error details.

methods.name: errorHandler
methods.description: Handles general errors, logs the error, and sends a JSON response with error details and request ID.
